recipe.title: Greek Salad
recipe.description: Fresh Mediterranean salad with feta, olives, and crisp vegetables

steps.descr: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces
steps.instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by chopping all those lovely vegetables into bite-sized pieces. Take your time and enjoy the process!

steps.descr: Combine tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion in a bowl
steps.instructions: Combine tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion in a bowl

on_enter.say: Now, let's combine the chopped tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion in a nice big bowl. It's going to look so colourful!
Lovely! Now, let's add those beautiful Kalamata olives and the cubed feta cheese. It's going to be delicious!

steps.descr: Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar
steps.instructions: Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar

on_enter.say: Let's drizzle some good quality olive oil and a splash of red wine vinegar over the salad. This will bring all the flavours together beautifully!

steps.descr: Sprinkle with oregano, salt, and pepper
steps.instructions: Sprinkle with oregano, salt, and pepper

on_enter.say: Now, sprinkle a bit of dried oregano, and season with salt and pepper to taste. This is where the magic happens!
Finally, give everything a gentle toss to mix all those lovely ingredients together. Serve it up straight away and enjoy your fresh Greek salad!

notes.text:
Use the ripest tomatoes you can find
Don't overdress - let the ingredients shine
Serve with warm pita bread
